range.caption: Chest pain indicative of myorcardial infarction
Chest pain indicative of unstable angina
Fracture compound (with a break in the skin)
Other injury caused by high energy mechanism

dataDefinitions.caption: Tews
dataDefinitions.name: tews
dataDefinitions.valueCondition: tews_mobility + tews_rr + tews_hr + tews_sbp + tews_temp + tews_avpu + tews_trauma

dataDefinitions.caption: AVPU Level of Response
dataDefinitions.name: avpu
dataDefinitions.valueCondition: is_known('gcs') ? (gcs>13 ? 'Alert' : (gcs==13 ? 'Confused' : ((gcs >= 9 && gcs <= 12) ? 'Reacts to Voice' : ((gcs >= 2 && gcs <=8) ? 'Reacts to Pain' : 'Unresponsive')))) : undefined

dataDefinitions.caption: tews (avpu)
dataDefinitions.name: tews_avpu
dataDefinitions.valueCondition: is_known('avpu') ? (   avpu=='Unresponsive' ? 3 : (     avpu=='Confused' || avpu=='Reacts to Pain' ? 2 : (       avpu=='Reacts to Voice' ? 1 : 0     )   ) ) : 0

dataDefinitions.caption: Gestational age (weeks)
dataDefinitions.description: How many weeks along is the pregnancy
dataDefinitions.name: gestational_age

dataDefinitions.caption: What prompts the call for an ambulance?
dataDefinitions.name: signs_pregnant

range.caption: pregnancy is not the reason for need of ambulance

dataDefinitions.caption: Please indicate management provided by the ambulance team
dataDefinitions.name: management

dataDefinitions.caption: Please enter the cause of death
dataDefinitions.name: cod

dataDefinitions.caption: Please check the relevant features of this pregnancy
dataDefinitions.name: pregnancy_features

dataDefinitions.caption: Please check the relevant features of delivery
dataDefinitions.name: delivery_features

dataDefinitions.caption: Please provide details of location of tourniquet
dataDefinitions.name: management_tourniquet

dataDefinitions.caption: Please provide details of IO infusion
dataDefinitions.name: management_infusion

dataDefinitions.caption: Glucose measurement is indicated. Check *No* if this is not possible.
dataDefinitions.name: glucose_available

dataDefinitions.caption: Cause of trauma
dataDefinitions.description: Was the trauma intentional or accidental?
dataDefinitions.name: trauma_cause

dataDefinitions.caption: Glasgow Coma Score
dataDefinitions.name: gcs
dataDefinitions.valueCondition: is_known('gcs_quick') ? gcs_quick : (is_known('gcs_e') && is_known('gcs_m') && is_known('gcs_v') ? gcs_e + gcs_m + gcs_v : undefined)

dataDefinitions.caption: Glucose_concern
dataDefinitions.name: glucose_concern
dataDefinitions.valueCondition: includes([9,29,26], signs_emergency) || includes([2,14], signs_very_urgent) ||( is_known('gcs') && gcs<13)

tasks.caption: Screen 6
tasks.name: screen6
tasks.preCondition: num_completed(['screen2','screen5a'])>0 && (   !is_known('age') ||   age>=12 )  &&   (   (     is_known('signs_emergency')  &&     signs_emergency == 0  &&     signs_very_urgent!=4 &&     (       !is_known('o2_available') ||        o2_available     )   ) ||    (     is_known('signs_pregnant')  &&     !signs_pregnant_urgent  && (signs_pregnant!=6) && (signs_pregnant!=-1)   ) ||   (     (       (         is_known('signs_emergency')  &&         signs_emergency==2       ) || (         is_known('signs_very_urgent')  &&         signs_very_urgent==4       )     )  &&     is_known('o2sats')  &&     o2sats>90   ) )

tasks.caption: Recommended Destination
tasks.description:
This page shows the type of the hospital that will be recommended.  In the implemented solution, a hospital will be named.

${is_known('rr') ? 'TEWS: ' + tews : ''}
tasks.name: destination

arguments.caption: emergency sign: ${caption('signs_emergency')}
arguments.description: Emergency signs are a strong argument for directing to tertiary care

arguments.caption: pregnant and very high blood pressure (sbp = ${sbp})
arguments.description: if sbp>150 and woman is pregnant send to nearest TRH

arguments.caption: pregnant and dangerous glucose levels (${glucose} mmol/l)
high TEWS score (${tews})
arguments.description: A patient with a TEWS score of 7 and above should go to a tertiary hospital

arguments.caption: Pregnant and unresponsive/seizures or delivery problems
acute shortness of breath and no sats
acute shortness of breath and o2 sats  90

candidates.caption: Secondary  health facility
candidates.description: District Hospital + specialised DH into Maternity, GBV, palliative care, Mental health
candidates.name: secondary

arguments.caption: medium TEWS score (${tews})
arguments.description: a patient with a TEWS score or 5 or 6 should be directed to secondary care

candidates.caption: Primary health facility or treat on site
candidates.description: Medicalised HC, Health centres & Health posts
candidates.name: primary

arguments.caption: low TEWS score (${tews}) and no urgent signs
arguments.description: A TEWS score less than 5 is considered low

tasks.caption: In preparation
tasks.description:
This guideline is for adults.

tasks.name: ineligible
